page.title: 11Technology in Plym.St.Mary.
page.content: A couple of farms in the area have decided that the{computer}would be a boon to the working of their farms. The computers are of modest sizes but coupled with a printer can readily aid the farmers in the day to day routine work. They are used to{keep records of the {cow herds}:- Numbers to identify them, their ages,illnesses,pregnancies,rate of feed and milk yield are all recorded. These records can be accessed very quickly abd as such provide quick reference to the herd. The actual{running costs}of the farm can also be aided by the speed of processing of the computer.
